admissionREQ.title: Admission
admissionREQ.sub: To be admitted to Safwat Al-Safwa International University, applicants must:

data.text: Hold a valid secondary school certificate.
Pass the university's entrance exams.
Meet specific requirements set by the intended college.
Obtain official approval from the university administration.

banner.title: safwat al-safwa international
banner.p: A Beacon for a Better Tomorrow

Description.title: Safwat Al-Safwa International University
text: Committed to delivering high-quality education across various disciplines. Our mission is to empower individuals through skill development, professional requalification, community engagement, and support for sustainable development. We adopt modern methodologies and tools to meet both local and international standards, keeping pace with the evolving world.

The university focuses on self-directed and collaborative learning, scientific research, training, and lifelong education for graduates and the wider community. Our goal is to enhance human competencies and minimize professional errors that may have serious consequences, ensuring our graduates meet global standards and contribute effectively to sustainable development.

Goals.title: Our Goals

goals.name: Semester-Based Academic System:
goals.text: A structured format that promotes consistent learning and evaluation.

goals.name: University Requirements:
goals.text: Life and work skills courses designed to prepare students for self-employment or career progression in public and private sectors.

goals.name: College Requirements:
goals.text: Core academic courses necessary to complete a Bachelor’s Degree.

goals.name: Course Integration:
goals.text: Both horizontal and vertical alignment across courses to reinforce knowledge and skills.

Goals.subText: To achieve its vision, the university follows a structured and progressive approach aimed at delivering high-quality education and empowering future leaders.

Programs.title: Academic Programs
Programs.sub: The University Council, upon the recommendation of the College or Institute Council, awards the following degrees:

data.text: University Diploma (Associate Degree)
Bachelor’s Degree (Higher Diploma)
Postgraduate Diploma (Specialized Diploma)
Master’s Degree (Advanced Specialized Degree)
Doctorate Degree (Ph.D.)
Continuing Education Programs

WhyStudy.title: Why Study at Safwat
WhyStudy.subTitle: Key benefits of studying at our university include:
data: Personal growth through critical and creative thinking.
Contributing to and serving the community.

paras: Safwat Al-Safwa International University is committed to delivering high-quality education across various disciplines. Our mission is to empower individuals through skill development, professional requalification, community engagement, and support for sustainable development. We adopt modern methodologies and tools to meet both local and international standards, keeping pace with the evolving world.

The university focuses on self-directed and collaborative learning, scientific research, training, and lifelong education for graduates and the wider community. Our goal is to enhance human competencies and minimize professional errors that may have serious consequences, ensuring our graduates meet global standards and contribute effectively to sustainable development.

Look.title: About University & colleges
Look.para: The colleges aims to be a pioneer in promoting employment opportunities and sustainable development, excelling in research and innovation by preparing qualified graduates to drive community development. It also offers training and continuing education services for its graduates and others to enhance their competencies and keep pace with scientific and practical advancements.

values.title: Our Core Principles
values.description: At Safwat Al-Safwa International University, our mission is guided by a set of core principles that reflect our values, purpose, and unwavering commitment to academic and ethical excellence.

data.name: Ethical Values
data.text: Upholding strong moral principles and integrity in all aspects of university life.

data.name: Human Dignity
data.text: Respecting the inherent worth of every individual in our community.

data.name: Self-Learning
data.text: Emphasizing self-directed study and collaborative educational approaches.

data.name: E-Learning
data.text: Promoting digital learning and distance education to expand access and flexibility.

data.name: Excellence in Education
data.text: Delivering top-quality academic programs and pioneering research to graduate competent, distinguished individuals.

data.name: Leadership Development
data.text: Building leadership, management, and communication skills for future leaders.

data.name: Lifelong Learning
data.text: Providing ongoing training for graduates and the broader community to keep pace with evolving knowledge and industry needs.

data.name: Privacy and Confidentiality
data.text: Safeguarding personal and institutional data with care and responsibility.

data.name: Academic Excellence
data.text: Ensuring high standards in both academic teaching and research outputs.

data.name: Intellectual Freedom
data.text: Encouraging critical thinking, creativity, and free academic exploration.

data.name: Community Empowerment
data.text: Preparing professionals who serve and uplift their communities.

data.name: Communication Skills
data.text: Enhancing writing, negotiation, and interpersonal abilities.

data.name: Innovation
data.text: Fostering innovation in learning, teaching, and problem-solving.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: At Safwat Al-Safwa International University, our mission is grounded in a set of core values that reflect our deep commitment to faith, knowledge, ethics, and community service.

data.name: Faith and Reliance
data.text: Faith in God and reliance on Him in all our actions and decisions.

data.name: Moral Conduct
data.text: Practicing good manners and upholding high moral values.

data.name: Human Rights
data.text: Respecting and protecting the rights and dignity of every individual.

data.name: Comprehensive Education
data.text: Providing distinguished and inclusive vocational education.

data.name: Excellence
data.text: Pursuing excellence in education, research, and service.

data.name: Scientific Engagement
data.text: Active involvement in basic sciences and meaningful research.

values.title: Our Vision
values.description: We envision a modern academic environment that leads in innovation, education, and sustainable development. At Safwat Al-Safwa International University, we are committed to becoming a global leader by pursuing the following goals:

data.name: Accessible Education
data.text: Championing e-learning and distance education as inclusive tools for all learners.

data.name: Leadership Development
data.text: Becoming a hub for outcome-based learning to empower future local, regional, and global leaders.

data.name: Market-Driven Programs
data.text: Continuously upgrading academic programs to align with labor market demands.

data.name: Graduate Excellence
data.text: Producing highly qualified and competitive graduates equipped for success.

data.name: Innovative Curriculum
data.text: Developing advanced, forward-thinking educational programs.

values.title: Our Mission
values.description: Safwat Al-Safwa International University is dedicated to transforming lives through excellence in education, innovative research, and meaningful service. Our mission is to create impactful learning experiences and empower future generations by focusing on the following objectives:

data.name: E-Learning Leadership
data.text: Advancing digital and distance education across all academic disciplines.

data.name: Modern Learning Models
data.text: Prioritizing self-directed and collaborative learning approaches.

data.name: Academic Excellence
data.text: Delivering distinguished, high-quality education and pioneering research.

data.name: Leadership Development
data.text: Strengthening leadership, administration, and strategic capabilities.

data.name: Lifelong Learning
data.text: Providing continuous development opportunities for graduates and adult learners.

Benefits.title: Benefits of Studying at the
Benefits.para: At Safwat Al-Safwa International University, students gain more than just academic knowledge—they experience personal and professional growth that prepares them for success in a rapidly evolving world. By joining our academic community, students benefit from:

values.ques: Earning an internationally recognized academic degree
values.ans: Open doors to global opportunities with qualifications respected by institutions and employers worldwide.
Gain practical, in-demand skills that empower you to excel in your chosen field.
Increase your employability and access a wider range of career opportunities.

values.ques: Enhancing personal growth through critical and creative thinking
values.ans: Sharpen your critical thinking, creativity, and problem-solving abilities in an environment that encourages innovation.
Become an active contributor to society through knowledge, service, and leadership.

data.title: Academic Programs
data.para: Safwat Al-Safwa International University grants academic degrees upon the recommendation of the College or Institute Council and the approval of the University Council. The following degrees are awarded:
values: Ijaza Degree (Diploma)
Higher Ijaza Degree (Bachelor’s Degree)
Specialization Degree (Higher Diploma)
Advanced Specialization Degree (Master’s Degree)
Al-Alamiyya Degree (Doctorate)
Continuing Education Programs

data.title: Admission Requirements
data.para: To be eligible for admission to Safwat Al-Safwa International University, applicants must meet the following requirements:
values: Hold a high school diploma or its equivalent.
Pass the university’s entrance examinations.
Fulfill the specific admission requirements of the desired college.
Obtain official approval from the university.

items: Monday - Friday: 09:00 - 20:00
Sunday & Saturday: 10:30 - 22:0

box1.title: Key Benefits of E-Learning
values: Eliminates the need for traditional classrooms, allowing more flexibility and greater student capacity.
Reduces the overall cost of education.
Saves time and extends the student’s effective learning span.
Enhances education through interactive, self-paced, and collaborative learning, fostering engagement between students and instructors, as well as among peers.
Allows students to review lessons at any time, replay sessions, and benefit from explanations by multiple instructors, which improves comprehension and performance.
Encourages global exposure and interaction with students from various countries, promoting cross-cultural learning.
Improves job opportunities and supports career advancement through flexible access to education.

values.head: Synchronous Learning
values.para: This involves live sessions delivered through virtual classrooms over the internet. Students and instructors are online at the same time, allowing for real-time interaction and discussion.
items: No need to commute to campus, saving time and lowering costs.
Real-time engagement with instructors and classmates.

values.head: Asynchronous Learning
values.para: In this format, lessons are pre-recorded, allowing students to access them at their convenience. Students can send questions to instructors and participate in discussions at their own pace.
items: Flexible access to course content anytime, anywhere.
Students can revisit and review materials as needed, enhancing long-term understanding.

Cards.title: Regulations for Research Activity Management
values: EDUMA is committed to responsible and ethical conduct of research and stewardship of research funds. Our commitment to conducting impactful and responsible research is reflected in the policies and procedures for designing, conducting, supporting and reporting research at EDUMA.

Cards.title: Ethics Approval for Human Subjects Research
values: EDUMA must ensure that the rights and interests of human participants involved in EDUMA research are protected, that research is conducted with appropriate informed consent, and that the benefits of any research involving such participants outweighs the risks to them and others.

Cards.title: External Activities and Outside Income for VinUniversity Faculty and Staff Policy
values: External Activities and Outside Income for EDUMAUniversity Faculty and Staff Policy
This policy applies to all full-time faculty and staff employees of EDUMAUniversity. Any exceptions to this general scope of this policy will be clearly identified.

Gallary.title: Student Research Activities at Eduma University

main.text: Our alumni have a history of shared experiences and memories, understood by those who studied before them, those who studied with them and those who will soon join the alumni community.

values.title: Arabic Language Institute
values.text: The Arabic Language Institute is dedicated to teaching Arabic to non-native speakers through a comprehensive and immersive curriculum. The institute focuses on developing students' reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills, while also introducing them to Arab culture and traditions. With qualified instructors and modern teaching methods, the institute provides a supportive environment for learners at all levels.

values.title: Institute of Applied Sciences
values.text: The Institute of Applied Sciences offers specialized programs that combine theoretical knowledge with hands-on practical experience in various scientific and technical fields. The institute is committed to preparing students for careers in industries such as technology, engineering, health sciences, and environmental studies. Through state-of-the-art laboratories and experienced faculty, students gain the skills needed to meet real-world challenges.

values.pre: Medical students study college-required courses for a Bachelor of Medicine degree and university-required courses for an Associate's degree. The college focuses on:
items: Medical ethics, patient rights, and disease prevention
Patient care and healthcare delivery methods
Chemical and biological processes in living organisms
Disease diagnosis and treatment
Medical confidentiality, data analysis, and clinical trials
Scientific research in medicine
Commitment to excellence, patient well-being, and community health needs
Promoting research and global community engagement
Respect for human rights

values.pre: Students study college-required courses for a bachelor's degree and university-required courses for an associate's degree. The college emphasizes:
items: Medical ethics, patient rights, and disease prevention
Patient care, healthcare delivery, and biological chemistry
Dental structure and functions, microorganisms in the mouth
Diagnosis, treatment of dental and periodontal diseases
Dental surgery, orthodontics, and clinical diagnostics
Scientific research, clinical trials, and data analysis in dentistry
Collaboration, community engagement, and human rights

values.aft: The faculty focuses on practical training, scientific research, and community service.
items: Nursing: Training in various nursing disciplines
Medical Laboratories: Expertise in lab sciences
Radiology: Producing qualified radiologists
Physiotherapy: Preparing skilled physiotherapy professionals

main.text: Working side by side with undergraduates, our professors encourage students to see with new eyes. Through research, coursework, and casual interactions, students and faculty learn from and challenge each other on a daily basis.
